<onlyinclude>
== bEnableProfiling ==
* '''Default:''' <Code>0</Code>

This setting enables or disables the [[Papyrus Profile Analyzer]].
If off, none of the script profiling commands will be available.
Turn this setting on to allow profiling information to be collected and logged.
If on, script performance will degrade slightly.
</onlyinclude>
